title: The Gate Guardian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Slash** - 0 Use
- Slash at a player, incinerating them to atoms
**Speak** - Infinite Use
- During the day or night, speak; sending a player up to a 1000 character message.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Garden Of Eden**
- Presuming you were to die, the player who the host deems most influental killing you gains access to the Garden of Eden and all abilites / attributes assosiated with it.
- If anybody vists within X houses of you, gain a shot of slash. X = Player Count / 8 rounded.

desc:
Post 5200
*SCP-001 is a humanoid entity, approximately seven hundred (700) cubits in height, located in an undisclosed location near the intersection of the Tigris and Euphrates rivers.*
